RTACtoolsAnalysis module¶

class RTACtoolsAnalysis.RTACtoolsAnalysis(on_ram=False)¶

Bases: RTAscience.lib.RTACtoolsBase.RTACtoolsBase

This class contains wrappers for ctools and cscripts tools.
